medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Headaches began in February 2004 and gradually worsened. By May 2004, the patient experienced decreased vision in the right eye, diminished hearing in the right ear, swallowing difficulties (especially with solid foods), balance issues, and ambulation problems.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Smoker with a 40 pack-year history; no significant past medical history provided.
medical_history.family_history: Ischemic cardiac disease in father; no other significant family history mentioned.
